title: Randomly DCing in games
body: I am having this issue where i will randomly lose control of my character in game and cannot move. I can watch everyone else move around and play but it will not allow me to move. My ping stays at a low 35, and the majority of the time it never even says reconnecting like i haven't been disconnected. Does anyone have any recommendations on how to fix this? I have called my isp and they believe they are not the issue so i don't know where to look.

replies.body:
Galacius has some good points!

I wanted to add that it really sounds like you're having problems with some packet loss. We can know for sure by using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to look over your recent game logs. Take a screenshot of what it shows using something like Gyazo and we can go over it here together!

Hi Sorry,

Try running a network analysis and a tracert using the steps here --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs

This should show you where it's coming from and if you can't fix it on your own - you can always email player support with the tracert/analysis logs. I hope this helps!
